data.text:
@dustin_reyes Hi Dustin. Sha here. If you availed of 20kg prepaid baggage, you may bring 1 baggage only. 
 For more info, please check this link (https://t.co/lXA1Cho2q6). I hope this helps. Have a great day ahead!
@sheLoves15 No worries, sheLoves. Have a great day ahead!

@greerlandeza Hi Greer. Fares are subject to availability. First come first served basis.  Quoted one-way base fares are inclusive of 7kg hand carry baggage allowance, but exclusive of applicable fees, fuel surcharge & add-ons. Stay safe.

@sheLoves15 Once booking is confirmed, just send us the booking reference, passenger's name and correct birth date so we can update the guest's details. Along with booking reference and name of adult companion. thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK.

@sheLoves15 Hi sheLoves! You have to make a separate booking for the child but it cannot be done online as system will not allow booking of child passenger in a single record.  please book the child as adult passenger first.

data.text: @sophienepo Hi +639177735267. We're moving all of our chat engagements. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

urls.description: SIGN UP FOR A MYCEBUPACIFIC ACCOUNT AND WIN! Prize: Two (2) Roundtrip all-inclusive tickets to any CEB Philippine destination STEP 1 Sign up and create a MyCebuPacific Account at cebupacificair.com/sign-up and verify your email on or before November 19, 2022. Existing members may be eligible if email is subscribed to Cebu Pacific email database and is fully verified by abovementioned date. STEP 2 All eligible membe rs will receive an email on November 21, 2022 with a survey link. Fill out all the required

data.text: Get a chance to win 2 roundtrip flights to any CEB local destination! All fully verified MyCebuPacific members, new or existing, will receive an email on Nov 21, 2022 with instructions to qualify. For full details and promo mechanics, visit https://t.co/dMI9odeH05. https://t.co/ZbM9YLqbVH
@AllenCua_ Got this Allen. If MNL to Japan, that would be PHP800/per kg. Charged at the airport. See you soon!

@AllenCua_ Hi Allen! If Domestic PH to Domestic - PHP 350. Fee application will be per KG, per guest per sector/through sector if you exceed the weight of your CEB prepaid baggage availed. Different if international flight. Stay safe.

@hartepinephrine Hi gab. Bern here. Some of our flights still operate as scheduled. In case of cancelation, a notification will be sent via email. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, you can use this link https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS.

data.text: @jean_candelaria I'm sorry to hear this JEAN. Bern here. You may try to use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.). Clear your browser's cache and cookies - Use Google Chrome browser if possible. Stay safe.
@jean_candelaria Hi Jean.  If you're using the app,  ensure that the app is updated or if already updated, uninstall then reinstall the CEB mobile app.  I hope this helps. Thank you!

data.text: @AltavozMagalong Hi Magalong. Wearing facemask is still required while on board. Travel requirements may vary depending on passenger's category and purpose of travel. To view the list of the updated guidelines please refer to these links: https://t.co/5glTT4YGnG / https://t.co/ZjYG3hWkLE Thanks!

@ellabair Hi Janella. Sorry to hear this. May we know the details of your flight please? You may also send the details of your concern through: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you with the live agent. Our team will be glad to assist you. Thank you!

@elives12 Hi Elle.  20x20 balikbayan box maybe accepted. Note that Checked baggage must also not exceed 39 inches on any side. Any checked baggage that exceeds 39 inches will be charged an oversized baggage fee. Hope this helps!

data.text: @uggggggggggghhh Hi meow. There will be no fee if name correction. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.
@escamanblog Alright, エスカマン🇦🇪ドバイ在住! Have a great day ahead!
@____augustine Hi Ily. Yes, you can bring a clothes iron in your hand carry, as long as it follows the dimensions for hand carry. Thanks!

@____augustine Hi  Ily. Yes, you can bring a hair drier and hair styling tools in your hand carry, as long as it fits in the dimensions for hand carry. Learn more about it here(https://t.co/EhmSrp2L5V). Please pack it properly to avoid breakage. Thanks!

@yo12290113 Hi yukiono. I'm sorry to hear this. If your flight was last 30Oct, we needed to cancel some flights due to resource and operational challenges due to the inclement weather brought about by Tropical Storm Paeng (Nalgae). Hoping for your kind understanding.

data.text: @ronarepancol I'm sorry to hear this Rona. Please do the following troubleshooting and then try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated.

data.text: @shyxkjk Hi Shy. We will be glad to look into the error. To further assist you and the security of your personal information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wEvz3 . Or, send us a private message via: https://t.co/gNaqWVnZKE. Thanks!

@samjavier Hi Sam. This is a developing situation. Our priority is to ensure the safety of our passengers and crew aboard the flight. Flight will continue if safety parameters will be within limits. So expect that there may be sudden changes in schedule or delays. Thanks!
@shyxkjk Hi Shy.  Sorry to know that you're having problem on payment page. May we verify the error you have encountered?

@GJK_golden Hi BTSxGOT7. Regret on the inconvenience. May we verify your flight details for us to check the flight status.  You may also check the status of your flight through this link: (https://t.co/n8RpsOuboq).  Thank you!

data.text: @sushaniee I'm sorry to hear this Tokyo. We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.
@hsudana_ Hi c. You may present their birth certificate upon check in as proof of identification. See you on board soon!

@frannychoo We are sorry to hear your frustrations, france/berns.  For us to check on the concern further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@emboy4real Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Emboy. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@boescarrilla Hi Boescarilla Marciano! To monitor/check the status of your flight, you may refer to https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS. Or for any travel advisory, kindly visit https://t.co/KuymGz608i. Thank you!

@imdidihadid We are sorry to hear your frustrations and for the inconvenience you may have felt also, DD. To assist your further and to check on the concern, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
